about_the_game:
Triple Tree Aerodrome is a 501c3 non-profit organization located in Woodruff, South Carolina. Their sprawling 400-acre facility is a mecca for aviation that’s home to many full-scale and radio-control events, including the world-famous Joe Nall week and Triple Tree Fly-In, as well as year-round educational opportunities within their Aviation Centered Education (ACE) portfolio. This is the electric flying site/flight line that is designed to accommodate electric-powered park flyers and other models with up to 80” wingspans, featuring adjacent hard surface and grass runways suitable for a wide variety of model types.

This PhotoField uses a spherical photograph of location, then adds extensive depth-mapping to allow your aircraft to interact with the ground and other objects.
detailed_description:
Triple Tree Aerodrome is a 501c3 non-profit organization located in Woodruff, South Carolina. Their sprawling 400-acre facility is a mecca for aviation that’s home to many full-scale and radio-control events, including the world-famous Joe Nall week and Triple Tree Fly-In, as well as year-round educational opportunities within their Aviation Centered Education (ACE) portfolio. This is the electric flying site/flight line that is designed to accommodate electric-powered park flyers and other models with up to 80” wingspans, featuring adjacent hard surface and grass runways suitable for a wide variety of model types.

This PhotoField uses a spherical photograph of location, then adds extensive depth-mapping to allow your aircraft to interact with the ground and other objects.
